description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Zomp 3: The Quest for Z's is a puzzle adventure game that is full of old-school fun! Collect all the Z's on the map while avoiding certain death. Enemies will stand in your way, push you around, trap you, and kill you if you're not careful. Follow Zomp through his dreams on many different themed levels: forest, ice, desert, underwater, space, lava, and caves.
